description: Monitors and syncs calendar events originating from Google Calendar, Google Appointments, and Google Meet. Also serves as a reference point for cross-app event coordination.

automation_links.notes: Appointments are automatically synced into Google Calendar.
Google Meet links are embedded in newly created events.
Monitors for sync accuracy between Google Calendar and Notion Calendar.

on_mismatch_or_missing: Explain the situation to the user
Ask for permission before syncing missing events to Notion
If there is a conflict, list alternative time slots

integration_behavior.on_sync_issue: Notify user and provide resolution options

note: Google Calendar is not the main input source for user-created tasks or projects but serves as a hub for external and team-created events.
